version_description:
+ New Symbols and Sexy Emojis Added.
+ Fixed bugs.

Hey Fonts Keyboard fans! Super excited to bring you this new update.
- Redesigned the app UI to make it much more easy to use
- Changed the App Icon, added a lot of emojis packs including some Christmas packs.
- Added Font Converter, which could easily convert the clipboard texts to your selected fonts.
- Redesigned the Third-Party Keyboard extension
- Add the iMessage Extension, which could directly convert the clipboard texts with your selected font and easily send it to iMessage.
- Bug fixes & Performance improvements.

- Add more fonts and emojis.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.
